Text Transform

# Text Transform

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class               | Support        |
| ------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
uppercase
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
lowercase
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
capitalize
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
normal-case
``` | 🌐 Web only    |
